sentence: Israel  is  intensifying  air  strikes  on  Gaza  after  the  weekend's  surprise  air,  land  and  sea  attack  by  Hamas,  in  which  militants  killed  1,300  Israelis  and  took  some  150  as  hostages.
It's  also  carrying  out  heavy  bombardments  across  the  territory,  killing  at  least  1,350  people  and  internally  displacing  hundreds  of  thousands  of  others.
